posts.post_content:
All, 

I'm trying to track down and possibly purchase the following 19th century Columbus Base Ball memorabilia. Any help would be awesome. 

From 2004 REA Auction Lot #478
1889 Columbus Base Ball Club Schedule/Banner Display

[IMG]http://net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=751&pictureid=20298[/IMG]

From 2013 Fall REA Auction Lot #845
1883 Philadelphia vs. Columbus American Association scorecard
Scorecard on the right

[IMG]http://net54baseball.com/picture.php?albumid=751&pictureid=20299[/IMG]

PM or email, [url]shernan30@gmail.com[/url], if you have or know who has these items. I've very motivated to add these to my growing Columbus collection.

Thanks for looking,

Steven
You live in lancaster? I live just down 158 in baltimore and good luck finding those items.
